user.title: DTSU666 Emulator Configuration
user.description: Configure the DTSU666-H Modbus TCP server emulator. Map your Home Assistant sensor entities to the corresponding power meter registers.

data_description.port: TCP port for the Modbus server (default: 502)
data_description.voltage_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for voltage measurements
data_description.current_l1_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for L1 current
data_description.current_l2_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for L2 current
data_description.current_l3_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for L3 current
data_description.power_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for active power
data_description.energy_import_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for imported energy
data_description.energy_export_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for exported energy
data_description.frequency_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for frequency
data_description.reactive_power_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for reactive power
data_description.power_factor_entity: Home Assistant sensor entity for power factor
data_description.disable_validation: Disable validation that rejects connections when entities have invalid data

error.port_in_use: Port is already in use by another service
